data.persona: I have a wonderful hat.  My tunic is of superb fabric.  My sword is the finest.
data.description:
You are in the Cottage.
The small cottage was white with two, shuttered windows. It was in the unique shape of a circle and was built of plaster. Smoke billowed from the chimney.
There's two chimneys and two shuttered windows here.
The a grazing milk cow in the background is here.

You are carrying nothing.
data.goal: hit a grazing milk cow in the background

data.short_motivation: I need to herd the grazing milk cow back to the barn.
data.mid_motivation: I need to bring all the animals and tools into the barn today because it smells like a thunderstorm is on its way.
data.long_motivation: I need to keep my home and my farm well-maintained and protect my property from disasters because despite my fine clothing and sword, I cannot afford to lose my animals or my tools.

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
